content: Looking forward over the foreseeable future, we believe Air Lease's proven business model is particularly well suited to benefit from the post pandemic era due primarily to the five following fundamentals: First, passenger traffic growth in airline yields; Airline traffic continues to expand at a brisk pace in nearly every market globally; International traffic in particular has come back strongly in 2022, and this looks to continue in 2023 with China relaxing traveler restrictions last month.
